MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.25pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.46PM on 31st December 2020.
